summary: Provides core neural network layer primitives for the NeRF geometry module, including a configurable multiâ€‘layer perceptron and a residual linear block that can be stacked to build deep models for 3D scene representation.
business_intent: To supply reusable, flexible building blocks that simplify the creation and experimentation of deep networks used in neural radiance field (NeRF) geometry pipelines, accelerating research and product development in 3D rendering and computer vision.
